name: Skuncat's Adventure
description:
Skuncat's Adventure
===

A very short game by
Marianne M. Michel

made for VimJam 2020

contains some secrets and lot's of bugs, and just a fraction of the content it should have.

also, the moon is having some trouble.

CAUTION
Don't go down the holes into the secret cavern! I managed to make it impossible to climb out again. /facepalm

CONTROLS
Move: arrow keys or A and D
Crouch: S or downwards arrow
Pause/Menu: Tab or Escape
Dialogue: Enter/Leftclick or left arrow

THEME
The game jam limitation was Collectables, the theme There and back again. Originally, I wanted to add more items to grant new abilities and open locked sections (like the surfboard), so that you play through the levels multiple times, each time finding new areas.

I'll upload a bug-fixed, un-glitched version after the game jam ends. Tell me in the comments, if you'd like to see a full version with better levels and more items.

Thanks so much for playing!
